txt.en: 'Everyone, I have asked you to gather to tell you that it is time for us to leave.'
'I have come to realize that Marton is lost to us.'
'The Fords have fallen, and Rohan is at war. The Westfold belongs to the enemy.'
'I would rather die than follow you!'
'Our friend here has gone to great lengths to find us a safe path to Helm's Deep.'
'Helm's Deep! You would have us abandon our homes, woman?'
'Please! There is no need for violence.'
'I know it is difficult, but we must flee! It is our best hope. It is what Glads√∫nu wanted.'
'You may all defy me if you wish -- I will not oppose you. But I beg you to reconsider....'
'Clearly you are unfit to lead a mouse to cheese, Lady Agelwyn, if this is your solution.'
'Not resisting us is the first wisdom I have heard from you.'
'It pains me, but...but I must insist. Please ready yourselves to ride at once!'
